page.title: 13Inverarity S.W.R.I.
page.content: The Scottish Women's Rural Institute is the oldest community group in Inverarity. It was founded in August 1920 and was first held in the Fotheringham Estate Hall.It is now in Inverarity School Hall on the first Thursday of every month.At the moment it has about forty members and its president is Mrs.Russo.At each of the monthly meetings they have two competitions for baking and sewing and they invite other rural groups to come and entertain. The S.W.R.I. is a very active group who help the community with their fund raising efforts.
